Instructions:
1. The firmware used in JUXIN project is gx318l_h6_juxin_debug.pkg and gx318l_h6_juxin_release.pkg.

Version Info:
2024.07.27: Update firmware to temp version: v24.008.00037(GX316-7437: [Juxin] DVD3V switch to 1V8.)
